verses.verse: (Ps. 138:2) Because Your lovingkindness is better than life, My lips shall praise You.
Thus I will bless You while I live; I will (Ps. 28:2; 143:6) lift up my hands in Your name.
My soul shall be satisfied as with marrow and fatness, And my mouth shall praise You with joyful lips.
When (Ps. 42:8) I remember You on my bed, I meditate on You in the night watches.
Because You have been my help, Therefore in the shadow of Your wings I will rejoice.
My soul follows close behind You; Your right hand upholds me.
But those who seek my life, to destroy it, Shall go into the lower parts of the earth.
They shall fall by the sword; They shall be a portion for jackals.
But the king shall rejoice in God; (Deut. 6:13; (Is. 45:23; 65:16)) Everyone who swears by Him shall glory; But the mouth of those who speak lies shall be stopped.
Oppressed by the Wicked but Rejoicing in the LORD To the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. [1] Hear my voice, O God, in my meditation; Preserve my life from fear of the enemy.
